about_the_game:
Play as detective Max washed ashore on a dark nefarious cult island. Your ship has sunk you must explore the island and Black Blood Castle to unravel it's mysteries. Defeat the erotic, sexualized and voluptuous cult women that follow the calling of the Void. Save the missing women and escape the island.

Cult 87 plays like an old school shooter with 2D and 3D elements. The 2D elements use a 8 sided sprite system to give you the feeling of 3D like Doom. Some actions require a selection to the storyline giving you some freedom to choose what you want to say or interact with.

Features
    Unlock erotic animations
    Animations rendered to 8 sides to give look of 3D
    Find hidden secrets and collect keys and items
    Find magic books to cast spells
    Connect with Lovense sex toys while viewing the erotic animations
